sentences.en: ALT 、 AST 、 ALP and CK were increased 2 - 10 fold.
sentences.cn: 血液生化检查显示ALT、AST、ALP和 CK升高 2~10倍,肌酐和尿素有所升高.

sentences.en: Estrogen can increase osteoblast ALP activity , osteocalcin production, and power of bone - grown up.
sentences.cn: 结论:雌激素能增加成骨细胞的ALP活性和骨钙素的产生, 促进成骨细胞的骨形成能力.

sentences.en: Meanwhile , the cells osteogenic differentiation was examined by ALP staining.
sentences.cn: 细胞ALP染色观察成骨细胞的形成.

sentences.en: Methods ALP and PALP in urine were measured by Kings and EDTA inhibition method in pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 方法采用金氏法及EDTA抑制法监测孕妇尿液alp及Palp变化.

sentences.en: Methods Calibrate the constant K of ALP with the criterion liquid of p - nitrophenol.
sentences.cn: 方法用对硝基酚标准液校正碱性磷酸酶(alp)的K值.

sentences.en: Methods Successive observe the patients'serum � � - GGT, ALP, ALT and AST, and B - ultrasound of liver and gallbladder.
sentences.cn: 方法动态观察应用TPN的 55例急性胰腺炎病人血清酶学(γ-GGT 、 ALP、 ALT、 ast) 、 胆红素(TB 、 D8)、肝胆B超.

sentences.en: Serum ALT, AST, ALP, T - Bil was determined. RESULTS : Serum ALT and AST increased in both models.
sentences.cn: α-萘异硫氰酸酯致肝损伤模型小鼠血清中ALT 、 AST 、 碱性磷酸酶(ALP) 及总胆红素( T -Bil)含量的影响.

sentences.en: The activities of LDH and ALP in serum were measured on the 0,3 th , 6 th , 9 th day post - inoculation ( dpi ).
sentences.cn: tenella孢子化卵囊,分别于感染0,3, 6, 9d采血,用于血清LDH和ALP活性 的测定.

sentences.en: The ALP activity and the expression of osteocalcin increased.
sentences.cn: 成纤维细胞alp活性增高、骨钙素表达增多,细胞内alp染色加深.

sentences.en: The ALP, BGP, the indexes of bone formation increased.
sentences.cn: 骨形成指标血碱性磷酸酶(ALP) 、 骨钙素(BGP) 上升.

sentences.en: The BGP, ALP, NTX in CRF group had also no significant difference ( P ＞0.05 ).
sentences.cn: CRF组BGP 、 ALP 、 NTX的差异均无统计学意义 ( P值均>0.05 ).

sentences.en: The influences of LaCl 3 on BMSCs were analyzed by MTT and alkaline phosphatase ( ALP ) semiquantitative measurement.
sentences.cn: 通过MTT法、碱性磷酸酶半定量检测分析La3+对BMSCs的影响.

sentences.en: The levels of ALT, AST, TP , ALB, ALP in serum and MDA in hepatic tissue were mesured.
sentences.cn: 观察大鼠血清丙氨酸转氨酶(ALT) 、 天门冬氨酸转氨酶(AST) 、 总蛋白(TP) 、 碱性磷酸酶(ALP) 、白蛋白(ALB)及肝组织丙二醛(MDA)的含量变化.

sentences.en: The osteoblasts differentiated from marrow stromal cells expressed ALP activity.
sentences.cn: 成骨细胞碱性磷酸酶表达阳性.

sentences.en: There were significant differences between two groups in menopause duration , ALP, BGP, BMD, and IL - 6 ( P & gt; 0.05 ).
sentences.cn: 绝经年限、血总碱性磷酸酶(ALP) 、 血清骨钙素(BGP) 、 骨密度 、 血浆IL -6 浓度有显著性差异 ( P & lt; 0.05 ).

trans.tran_en: (in the European Alps) an area of pasture above the valley bottom but below the mountain peaks
